newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE cocoa ends lower after early momentum lost.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE cocoa ends lower after early momentum lost.

text.p: LIFFE cocoa ended lower as the market lost impetus after earlier gains.
Active May last traded four stg down at 875 stg.
May had seen a high of 884 stg, but the weight of origin pressure above the market had reasserted itself.
"People just don't want to get into it," he said. "It's died a death."
Total volume was 7,522 lots, of which 3,572 were on May.
But much of the volume came from one big May/December cross, done during the morning, he said. Without that it had been a quiet day's trading.
